long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Metalet, your one-stop Bitcoin and sidechain management expert, aims to provide you with a convenient and secure digital asset management platform. 

Our solutions extend across apps and browser extensions, ensuring smooth and confidential operations on all major cryptocurrency exchanges and standard Bitcoin wallets. With our unwavering commitment to security, privacy protection, and compatibility, Metalet fully supports a wide range of protocols, including Ordinals, Runes, BRC20, MVC20, and MetaID. 

Metalet plugin application provides the following functions: 
1. Real-time calculation of SPACE transaction fees. 
2. Quickly and conveniently send and receive SPACE and other cryptocurrencies. 
3. View SPACE and other cryptocurrencies' prices and market values in the application.  

The user interface design of Metalet Bitcoin Wallet plugin application is simple, clear, and easy to operate, conforming to the usage habits of most users. Furthermore, the application has built-in security protection technology to provide extreme privacy protection for users.

Metalet，您的一站式比特币及侧链管理管家，旨在为您提供一个既便捷又安全的数字资产管理平台。
我们的解决方案跨越APP和插件端，确保您在各大主流加密货币交易所和比特币钱包中的操作既流畅又保密。凭借我们对安全性、隐私保护以及兼容性的不懈追求，Metalet已全面支持包括Ordinals、BRC20、Runes, MVC20、MetaID在内的多种协议。

选择Metalet，享受无忧的数字资产管理体验。Metalet插件应用提供以下功能： 
1. 实时计算加密货币交易费用。 
2. 快速方便地进行收发加密货币。 
3. 在应用中查看加密货币价格和市值。 

Metalet插件应用的用户界面设计简洁明了，操作方便，符合广大用户的使用习惯，同时应用内置的安全防护技术，将用户的隐私保护到极致。
